item.title: S&P 500 little changed as 2024's relentless rally takes a pause: Live updates
item.description: Stocks were little changed Tuesday as a rally to record levels took a pause.

item.title: South Korean won cuts losses after parliament votes to lift martial law
item.description: South Korea's won on Tuesday cut losses after the country's parliament swiftly passed a resolution to demand the lifting of martial law.

item.title: More investors are turning toward the equal-weighted S&P 500 ahead of 2025
item.description: Investors are betting there will be more gains to be found in the equal-weighted index as opposed to the market-cap benchmark following this year's ra...

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Tesla, U.S. Steel, FedEx, AT&T and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: European markets close higher as investors closely watch political upheaval in France
item.description: European markets closed higher Tuesday, with investors keeping an eye on political upheaval in France this week.
